name: Happy Flappy Wheels: Revenge Of The Bird Pipes
name_original: Happy Flappy Wheels: Revenge Of The Bird Pipes
description:
Help helicopter man avoid the deadly obstacles!!!

BEWARE: Difficult and Super Addicting!

*Tap to Fly
*Collect coins to get points
*Try to get 4 medals: Bronze (10), Silver (50), Gold (100), Platinum (200)
